name: Vipin Kumar
description:
Thanks for stopping in and check back soon.

Hi...

I am a post-graduate student, working in AppSquadz Technologies Pvt Ltd. as a Digital Marketing Executive and have written more than 10 articles on various different verticals. Apart from this, I love the internet so that I came to Internet Marketing.

Now I have around 1+ years of working experience in Digital Marketing.
